participant_1.background:
I'm a quick learner and I'm always looking for ways to improve my skills.
My favorite pair of running shoes were the first thing I remember buying.
i like to play basketball.
I am not interested in dating, as I am too focused on my career.
My biggest fear is that something will happen to my kids.

participant_2.background:
I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
i have been married five times.
i escaped and later became a carpenter.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: hi, what's up?
Hi there! Not much, just got back from a long bike ride.
Oh fun! I used to bike a lot, but I don't have as much time anymore.
Yeah, it's tough to find the time. I usually go on weekends, when I can.
I miss it. I really like the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Do you do anything else for fun?
I go to yoga classes sometimes. I also like to sew.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been to a yoga class, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! It's really great for your mind and body.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I like to play basketball. I also like to read and watch movies.
Oh, that's cool. I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different kinds of books. I really like historical fiction and mystery novels.
Me too! I love historical fiction. I'm reading a book about the Civil War right now.
That sounds interesting! I'm not sure if I've ever read a book about the Civil War.
You should! It's a really good book.
I might have to check it out.
You definitely should!
